db:abstract.db:para: The QColorTransform class is a transformation between color spaces.

db:listitem.db:para: QColorTransform is part of Painting Classesappearance

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QColorTransform is an instantiation of a transformation between color spaces. It can be applied on color and pixels to convert them from one color space to another.
To create a QColorTransform, use QColorSpace::transformationToColorSpace():
Setting up a QColorTransform takes some preprocessing, so keeping around QColorTransforms that you need often is recommended, instead of generating them on the fly.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept, since 6.4] bool QColorTransform::isIdentity() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the color transform is the identity transform.
This function was introduced in Qt 6.4.

db:section.db:title: QRgb QColorTransform::map(QRgb argb) const
db:section.db:para: Applies the color transformation on the QRgb value argb.
The input should be opaque or unpremultiplied.

db:section.db:title: QRgba64 QColorTransform::map(QRgba64 rgba64) const
db:section.db:para: Applies the color transformation on the QRgba64 value rgba64.
The input should be opaque or unpremultiplied.

db:section.db:title: [since 6.4] QRgbaFloat16 QColorTransform::map(QRgbaFloat16 rgbafp16) const
db:section.db:para: Applies the color transformation on the QRgbaFloat16 value rgbafp16.
The input should be opaque or unpremultiplied.
This function was introduced in Qt 6.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 6.4] QRgbaFloat32 QColorTransform::map(QRgbaFloat32 rgbafp32) const
db:section.db:para: Applies the color transformation on the QRgbaFloat32 value rgbafp32.
The input should be opaque or unpremultiplied.
This function was introduced in Qt 6.4.

db:section.db:title: QColor QColorTransform::map(const QColor &color) const
db:section.db:para: Applies the color transformation on the QColor value color.

db:section.db:title: [since 6.4] bool operator!=(const QColorTransform &ct1, const QColorTransform &ct2)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if ct1 does not define the same transformation as ct2.
This function was introduced in Qt 6.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 6.4] bool operator==(const QColorTransform &ct1, const QColorTransform &ct2)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if ct1 defines the same color transformation as ct2.
This function was introduced in Qt 6.4.
